CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
This test verifies that the correct node is revealed in the DOM tree when asked to reveal a user-agent shadow DOM node.

User-agent shadow DOM hidden:
SelectedNodeChanged: input (in author shadow DOM)
User-agent shadow DOM shown:
SelectedNodeChanged: div (in user-agent shadow DOM)
